markdown.markdown:
Hi! I'm Charis, a psychology undergraduate at NUS. This website serves as a visual outlet for demonstrating various topics covered in the NM2207 "Computational Media Literacy" course, with the goal of visualising specific waste features and patterns in Singapore from 2003 to 2017. It has the potential to reveal and inform on the state of recycling and energy savings.

### Data Set

This application makes use of two datasets, both retrieved from Emin Basturk Kaggle page, "Singapore NEA Energy Savings". These two datasets, 'Waste Statistics' and 'Energy Saved' were selected not only to illustrate recycling rates for various materials, but also to reveal findings such as the differential efficiency of certain materials in terms of energy savings while recycling.

### Citations

Clean & Green Singapore. (2023, May 2). *Meet Bloobin*. Default. https://www.cgs.gov.sg/recycleright/meet-bloobin

Daugherty, L. (2024, March 1). *Recycling: A Guide to Saving Energy*. Save On Energy. https://www.saveonenergy.com/resources/recycling-save-energy/

*How Does Recycling Save Energy? \| Greentumble*. (2018, September 10). Green Tumble. https://greentumble.com/how-does-recycling-save-energy#google_vignette

Ministry of Sustainability and the Environment. (n.d.). *Zero Waste Nation*. Towards Zero Waste. Retrieved 15 April 2024, from https://www.towardszerowaste.sg/zero-waste-nation/

National Environment Agency. (2022, January 14). *Three In Five Households Recycled Regularly In 2021 – Singaporeans Are Encouraged To Recycle More And Recycle Right*. https://www.nea.gov.sg/media/news/news/index/three-in-five-households-recycled-regularly-in-2021-singaporeans-are-encouraged-to-recycle-more-and-recycle-right

National Environment Agency. (2023, May 3). *Waste Generation And Recycling Rates Increased In 2022 As Economic Activity Picked Up*. https://www.nea.gov.sg/media/news/news/index/waste-generation-and-recycling-rates-increased-in-2022-as-economic-activity-picked-up

NTU. (2023, September 19). Shining a light on upcycling plastic waste. *Science \@ NTU*. https://blogs.ntu.edu.sg/science/2023/09/19/shining-a-light-on-upcycling-plastic-waste/

Squarebird. (2023, June 7). *What is the Difference Between Ferrous & Non-Ferrous Metals?* SL Recycling. https://www.slrecyclingltd.co.uk/what-is-the-difference-between-ferrous-non-ferrous-metals/

Vishnoi, A. (2023, June 26). C&D Waste Management in Singapore: A Land-Scarce Challenge—Malba Project India. *Malba Project*. https://www.malbaproject.com/post/c-and-d-waste-management-singapore

Williams-Derry, C. (2006, January 21). *Is recycling glass worth it?* Grist. https://grist.org/article/pain-in-the-glass/
